entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unify usage pattern of obsolete gettimeofday #99206
  • [API Proposal]: Replace `TFrom : struct` constraint on `Unsafe.BitCast` with a dynamic check #99205
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: [JsonSourceGenerationOptions(DefaultIgnoreCondition = JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull)] fails with string type prop #99202

Closed

  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96253
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    needs-area-label
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AW_2A to AZ_2A, BM_1A, BN_1A #99211
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the local morph quirk with block locals #99209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Avoid generating (most) thunks #99208
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Fix handling of stack adjustments in prolog/epilog #99207
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Try every ip address on host connection #99204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • CI test #99201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • More SearchValues<string> tests #99197
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not contain out-of-bounds local addresses #99195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Mention NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy for PublicSign #99184
    area-Meta
  • Fix the Syndication Feed RFC822 DateTimeParser #99194
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] OSR: Fix initReg usage in genPushCalleeSavedRegisters #99156
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Disable optimizations for b425314.dll test #99170
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() should respect [ActivatorUtilitiesConstructor] #99175
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
